channel.title: CDN on SteveYi's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CDN on SteveYi's Blog

item.title: Setting up Custom Domain Name for Backblaze B2 with Cloudflare Workers
item.description: When building a website, it is important to consider issues related to image storage and traffic. Initially, I stored the images and website on the same web server, but later found that the server space was often insufficient (because the system automatically backed up, causing insufficient space). Later, I placed the images on OneDrive Business Edition and used it with OneList, but since it was an unofficial API, when the API request rate was too fast, the images failed to load.
